headline: How to Choose the Right Wireless Headphones
alternativeHeadline: A Complete Guide to Selecting Quality Wireless Headphones
description: An in-depth guide covering everything you need to know about choosing wireless headphones, including battery life, sound quality, noise cancellation, and comfort factors.
articleBody: When shopping for wireless headphones, battery life is one of the most important factors to consider. Modern wireless headphones typically offer between 20 and 40 hours of playback time...
